name: Current Promotions Display
author: Bobcares

sections.description:
Current Promotions Display WordPress plugin allows you to promote your products/services to your site visitors. Once a user is done with signup to your newsletter, blog, payment confirmation, registration, etc., a current promotion display is shown to the end user. The interaction sequence resumes after a pre-set amount of time.

The administrator interface has the following features:

  • Create different promotion templates using the native edit tool of WordPress.
  • A custom redirect delay can be set for each template.
  • A different URL can be set for each template.
sections.installation:
Follow the steps to install the plugin:

  1. Navigate to Add New Plugin page within your WordPress
  2. Search for Current Promotions Display Plugin
  3. Click Install Now link on the plugin and follow the prompts
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Or

  1. You can also download the plugin from the following location:
    http://bobcares.com/current-promotion-display.html
  2. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

On successful activation, a menu Plan Promoter will be displayed on the admin dashboard. Create new promotions by clicking on the Add new Promotion button.
You can configure the redirect delay and the redirect url from this page.
Click on ‘Publish’ option at the right side of the page to publish it.

Note : Please change the custom URL structure for your permalinks to Post name structure from wp-admin .step: go to Settings -> Permalinks and select Post name:
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin?

You can use this plugin to create and display advertisements during various site interaction sequences like newsletter signup, blog article display, etc.

How can I add new promotions?

You can add new promotions from the Dashboard.
Dashboard >> Plan Promoter menu >> Add New

A plan can be created just like a normal wordpress post/page. You will be able to embed images, videos, etc in the promotion templates.
Either you can directly add the contents and align it using the visual editor or you can add the corresponding html code.

What are the Redirect Delay and Redirect Url settings?

Redirect Delay corresponds to the time (seconds) for which the promotion will be displayed.
Redirect URL is the link to which the users will be redirected after displaying the promotion for the time specified in the Redirect Delay section.
